## BaseProvider.(constructor)

The `BaseProvider` constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(factory: Factory<T>, parameters?: ParameterDependencies, properties?: PropertyDependencies);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  factory | <code>Factory&lt;T&gt;</code> | The provider's factory function |
|  parameters | <code>ParameterDependencies</code> | The parameter dependencies of the factory function |
|  properties | <code>PropertyDependencies</code> | The property dependencies of the value returned from the factory function |
